data.name: lblTotalCot.ExpressionBindings
data.value: Iif(?Imprimir == 1 And ?Moneda == 1, [decSubtotal] - [decDescuento] + [decIva], Iif(?Imprimir == 2 And ?Moneda == 1, ([decSubtotal] - [decDescuento] + [decIva]) / ?Tasa, Iif(?Imprimir == 2 And ?Moneda == 2, [decSubtotal] - [decDescuento] + [decIva], Iif(?Imprimir == 1 And ?Moneda == 2, ([decSubtotal] - [decDescuento] + [decIva]) * ?Tasa, 0))))

data.name: lblSubtotalCliente.ExpressionBindings
